author: Matthew Dalton
title: France Brings Preliminary Charges Against Ex-President Sarkozy
text:
French authorities brought preliminary charges against former President Nicolas Sarkozy for illegally financing his 2007 presidential campaign with cash from the regime of Libyan dictator Moammar Gadhafi, a judicial official said.
The charges against Mr. Sarkozy—which an official said he denied—amount to a stunning blow for a politician who just 18 months ago was seeking to recapture the presidency in France’s election last year. 
...
